backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark mode color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, social tags, and AdSense script, loading the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and links to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main Student Hub pages with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that renders the router.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Ad container showing placeholder or a 728x90 banner depending on props.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Hig: Empty placeholder file for 300x250 ad component.
Injects HighPerformanceFormat ad scripts safely with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/components/nav/StickyNavbar: Sticky navbar with scroll detection, logo fallback, navigation links, and homepage section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/careerPa: Defines the CareerPath interface and exports a large list of categorized career paths. Used for selection in the roadmap builder.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/CareerPa: Searchable, grouped career path selector using popover and command components.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapB: Form component collecting career details and generating a roadmap using templates. Validates inputs and triggers roadmap creation via callback.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/roadmapT: Contains roadmap template data mapped by career categories and generates structured RoadmapData objects. Provides skills, tools, projects, strategies, plans, and salary ranges per category.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapT: Displays a generated roadmap with required skills, tools, projects, internship strategy, and monthly goals. Renders structured roadmap sections using cards and badges.
frontend/src/components/sections/Academi: Renders a grid of academic tools and opens calculators in a dialog via lazy-loaded components. Manages tool selection and displays corresponding calculators.
frontend/src/components/sections/CareerR: Wraps the roadmap builder and timeline, managing state for generated roadmap data. Provides layout and section heading for the AI roadmap feature.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyUt: Displays four daily utility tools and opens each inside a dialog using state-based selection.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Renders the site footer with about, contact, privacy links, ads, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with headline, CTA buttons, and an illustration, including smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/ResumeP: Shows resume and placement tools in a grid and opens the selected tool in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides light, dark, and system theme management with persistence and context access.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button that switches between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider state.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/A: Calculates attendance percentage and allowable bunk classes with validations and alerts.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/C: Lets users add subjects and computes CGPA and percentage from credits and grade points.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/M: A tool that takes internal and expected exam marks, validates them, and displays the predicted final score.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/P: Calculates percentage from obtained and total marks with validation and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Int: Generates a customizable internship application email based on user inputs and allows copying the result.
Interactive interview preparation checklist with progress tracking and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Lin: Checklist for optimizing a LinkedIn profile with item tracking and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Res: Creates a resume bullet point from action, result, and optional impact inputs, with copy support.
frontend/src/components/tools/utilities/: Computes age in years, months, and days based on a selected birthdate.
Calculates BMI from height and weight and displays category with a badge.
Interactive EMI calculator component computing EMI, total amount, and interest from user inputs.
Unit converter supporting length, weight, and temperature conversions with dynamic unit selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a Dfinity backend actor tied to the user's identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth flow, identity storage, and login state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility function to copy text to clipboard with modern and fallback implementations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage assembling main sections, ads, and SEO schemas for the Student Hub site.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Privacy policy page explaining data usage practices with structured sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AgeCalculatorPa: Lazy-loaded age calculator tool page rendered within a shared ToolPageLayout with SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AttendanceCalcu: Loads the attendance calculator tool inside a shared ToolPageLayout with SEO content and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BmiCalculatorPa: Renders the BMI calculator tool within ToolPageLayout using lazy‑loaded component and SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CareerRoadmapGe: Manages roadmap form state and displays the generated roadmap timeline within ToolPageLayout.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CgpaCalculatorP: Loads the CGPA/SGPA calculator component and wraps it with ToolPageLayout and related SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/EmiCalculatorPa: Displays the EMI calculator tool using lazy loading and ToolPageLayout for SEO content and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InternshipEmail: Provides the internship email template generator inside ToolPageLayout with content and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InterviewPrepCh: Shows the interview preparation checklist tool using ToolPageLayout and SEO sections.
frontend/src/pages/tools/LinkedinProfile: Renders a LinkedIn profile optimization checklist within ToolPageLayout and SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResumeBulletGen: Loads the resume bullet generator tool inside ToolPageLayout with content and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SgpaCalculatorP: Uses the CGPA/SGPA calculator component to compute SGPA within ToolPageLayout.
Shared layout for tool pages adding title, description, structured data, content sections, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/UnitConverterPa: Renders the unit converter tool using lazy loading inside ToolPageLayout.
frontend/src/routes/Router.tsx: Defines the app's router, lazy‑loads tool pages, and wraps routes in a themed root layout.
frontend/src/seo/content/age.ts: Provides age calculator content sections and FAQ entries for SEO and page rendering.
frontend/src/seo/content/attendance.ts: Provides SEO content explaining attendance percentage, calculation steps, university rules, and tips for maintaining required attendance.
frontend/src/seo/content/bmi.ts: Contains BMI-related SEO content covering BMI meaning, calculation, limitations, and FAQs for students.
frontend/src/seo/content/careerRoadmap.t: Includes SEO text describing career roadmaps, how to use the AI generator, and popular engineering career paths.
frontend/src/seo/content/cgpa.ts: Offers SEO content on CGPA definition, calculation formulas, step-by-step guidance, and percentage conversion methods.
frontend/src/seo/content/emi.ts: Provides EMI-related SEO content explaining EMI basics, formulas, education loan details, repayment tips, and FAQs.
frontend/src/seo/content/internshipEmail: Provides guidance and templates for writing effective cold emails for internships, covering structure, personalization, and finding company contacts.
frontend/src/seo/content/interviewPrep.t: Contains interview preparation guidance for technical and behavioral rounds, offering checklists, study areas, and interview-day tips.
frontend/src/seo/content/linkedinCheckli: Offers a detailed checklist for optimizing LinkedIn profiles, covering sections like photo, headline, about, skills, endorsements, and recommendations.
frontend/src/seo/content/resumeBullets.t: Explains how to write strong resume bullet points using action verbs, metrics, and the STAR method, with examples and section-specific advice.
frontend/src/seo/content/sgpa.ts: Defines SGPA-related interfaces and provides explanations, formulas, and steps for calculating SGPA and converting it to percentage.
frontend/src/seo/content/unitConverter.t: Provides SEO content sections and FAQs for the unit converter tool, including explanations of unit categories, common conversions, and student use cases.
frontend/src/seo/HeadTags.tsx: Updates document head metadata dynamically based on the current route's SEO settings.
frontend/src/seo/jsonld.ts: Generates JSON-LD schemas for web applications, breadcrumbs, and FAQ pages using provided metadata.
frontend/src/seo/seoRoutes.ts: Defines SEO metadata for each route, including titles, descriptions, keywords, and canonical paths for all major site tools.
frontend/src/seo/siteConfig.ts: Exports base site URL resolver and global SEO site configuration such as name, description, keywords, and social metadata.
frontend/src/seo/StructuredData.tsx: Injects JSON‑LD structured data scripts into the page for SEO.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme settings, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, goals, constraints, known issues, and existing features for the Student Hub static website.
